column4: This is getting uncomfortable, and I've written this question 3-4 times now. Sorry for the repeat, but the question is out of the screens resolution :P
Why can't I write "@" ? :S I'm from Norway, my keyboard is set to "Norwegian" etc.
what happens when you try to type "@"
It's like it isn't a registred adress :/
are you sure the key you are typing is mapped to the @ sign
havint no experience with other keyboard layouts, I can only tell you to make sure your keyboard layout is set correctly
Welcome to the biggest problem. When trying to change it to my Logitech, I get an error...
The keyboard-crap still does not work :/
I really can't help you then. I have never tried to do what you are doing
